reasoning_log: The matching process relied on identifying unique architectural features and specific furniture configurations mentioned in the tags. Descriptions related to the living/dining area (Desc_1 to Desc_4) were differentiated by viewing angle and spatial emphasis (e.g., Image_1 is the pure living room, Image_3 emphasizes the large open space). Kitchen descriptions (Desc_6, Desc_7) were separated by the presence of the step down to the utility area (Image_7). Bedrooms were distinguished by size and specific storage solutions (Image_9 vs. Image_11) or the presence of extensive built-in cabinets (Image_12). Bathrooms (Desc_8, Desc_13) were separated based on floor tile material (wood-look vs. white marble-look). All 14 descriptions were successfully mapped 1:1 to the 14 images.

matching_result_list.evidence: This image shows the living room (客廳) with a sofa, coffee table, and TV console, fitting the '已部分家具' and '規則格局' tags.
This wide shot captures both the living area and the dining table, confirming the '開放客餐廳' layout and '家具配置現成'.
The image emphasizes the expansive, continuous wooden floor space between the dining and living areas, matching '大面積活動空間' and '動線良好'.
Focuses on the dining area (餐廳區) and clearly shows two separate doorways leading to rooms, confirming '與房間分區明確'.
This unique view includes the entrance door (玄關), dining table, and the small, open kitchen unit in the background, matching '玄關可規劃' and '小型開放廚房'.
Close-up of the kitchen showing the '流理台一字型', '櫥櫃收納足夠', and lack of visible windows, fitting '自然採光不足'.
Shows the kitchen leading to a doorway where the floor steps down, confirming '地面有高低差' and '後方連接工作陽台'.
Identified as Bathroom One due to the distinctive '木紋防滑地磚' and the presence of a window ('有對外窗').
This angle of the master bedroom clearly shows the double bed and the '下方矮櫃收納' beneath the window.
Another angle of the master bedroom, confirming the '雙人床尺度' and showing the wall space available for additional storage ('可加設衣櫃').
Shows a single bed in a room that appears '房型狹長' with limited storage, matching the description of the secondary bedroom.
The room is dominated by extensive built-in cabinets along the walls, perfectly matching '大量收納櫃' and '多功能房/和室房'.
The second bathroom, featuring white marble-look tiles, a window, and modern fixtures, fitting '衛浴全新現代' and '空間略緊湊'.
Clearly an outdoor utility space with metal bars, confirming '後陽台/曬衣區' and '有安全鐵窗'.
